long_description: With its streamlined design, the Gregory Miwok 44 Pack is the perfect choice for ultralight thru-hiking enthusiasts and mountain athletes looking for an overnight pack. Main pack body has quick-draw top closure and single anodized hook for maximum durability; U-shape zippered front access to main compartment. Top pocket with key clip and a second stash compartment on the underside; stretch front pocket; 2 external side pockets; dual quick-access hipbelt pockets. 2 hideaway axe/trekking pole loops; dual low-profile front daisy chains; 4 bottom lash points; side compression with lower wing for added stability. The Gregory Miwok 44 Pack features an integrated, color-matched rain cover and sunglasses stash on the shoulder harness.
short_description: With its streamlined design, the Gregory Miwok 44 Pack is the perfect choice for ultralight thru-hiking enthusiasts and mountain athletes looking for an overnight pack.
